document_data.name: Green Sword River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Green Sword River''' was an eastern tributary of the [[River of Swords]] in the [[Old Empires]] region of [[east Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Activities: The river served as a passageway for [[werecrocodile]]s migrating to the [[Lake of Salt]] from the ruins of [[Sekras]].
